strings.string: No Accounts have been created. Please Create a new account.
Server address wrong or wrong SSL
Testing all necessary settings have been entered
POP3 Server did not accept User Name or User Password
SMTP Server did not accept User Name or User Password
Are you sure you want to delete this inbox? Press OK to confirm, or press back to decline.
Are you sure you want to exit? Any un-saved account settings will be lost.Press OK to confirm, or press back to decline.
You can not have two Inboxes in the same account with the same Display Name.
You can not have two Accounts with the same Account Name.
Keep copies of Emails on server:
Select if you wish to LOGIN to a XinBox Account. If no accounts have been created, then you must CREATE an XinBox Account before logging in.
Select if you wish to CREATE a new XinBox Account. A XinBox account is required to LOGIN.
Select if you wish to CHANGE the XinBox settings.
Select if you wish to find out ABOUT the XinBox script.
Select if you wish to EXIT the XinBox script and return to XBMC.
Select to set the Account Name for your XinBox Account. Note: You will be unable to save your account without an Account Name.
Select to set the Account Password for your XinBox Account. Leave empty to disable a password for this account.
Select to toggle if this Account is the Default Account. A Default Account automatically logs in on script start-up. Note: There can only be a maximum of one Default Account.
Select to Add a new Inbox to this Account.
Select to Edit a Inbox in this Account.
Select to Delete a Inbox in this Account.
Select to Save all changed settings in this Account.
Select to exit this menu. Note: Any unsaved data will be lost.

Select to change your Display Name. This is the name of the Inbox and also the name that will appear in the From field of any outgoing E-mails. Note: You will not be able to add an inbox to your account without a Display Name.
Select to change your E-mail Address. This is the E-mail address other people use to send E-mail messages to you.
Select to change your Incoming mail (POP3) Server. Eg. pop.gmail.com. SSL: Press right to change your POP3 SSL Server Port Number. Only some servers require this. Eg. Gmail - Pop3 SSL Port# 995
Select to change your Outgoing mail (SMTP) Server. Eg. smtp.gmail.com. SSL: Press right to change your SMTP SSL Server Port Number. Only some servers require this. Eg. Gmail - SMTP SSL Port# 587
Select to change your Server Account Name. This is usually the name you use to login to Outlook/Web Mail Inboxes.
Select to change your Server Account Password. This is usually the password you use to login to Outlook/Web Mail Inboxes.
Select to change your Server Inbox Size. Enter the size(capacity) of your e-mail servers inbox in megabytes(MB).Set to 0 to disable the server inbox full warnings.
Select to change your XinBox Inbox Size. Enter the size(capacity) you want to allocate on your Xbox to this Inbox in Megabytes(MB).Set to 0 to disable the XinBox inbox full Warnings.
Select to change if copies of any new emails from when setting is changed are kept on the server. Defaults to Yes.
Select to Test the above inbox settings. "Test" will communicate with the inbox server and confirm all settings are ok.
Select to add inbox to your Account and return to the Account Menu. Note: The inbox will not be saved until Save is pressed in the Account Menu.
Select to Login to the above account.
Select to Login to the above inbox.
Select to exit and return to previous menu.
Select to change the "New Email" notification SFX. This is played when new emails are received into this Inbox. Select silent.wav to disable the SFX.
Select to confirm changes to your inbox and return to the Account Menu. Note: The inbox changes will not be saved until Save is pressed in the Account Menu.
Are you sure you want to delete this Account? All inboxes in this account will also be deleted. Press OK to confirm, or press back to decline.
Email was not found on server
Deleteing email from server and inbox
Are you sure you want to reset this inbox?
